Let me try to explain it more clearly.  I am sending a 100%
legitimate 
through all the built-in scenarios and the tevfifty (I am not going 
through the Tyrx chronicles).  I will use that team [after it has
been 
through the tevfifty) to determine if any of my scenarios are too 
difficult.  If any of the scenarios are too difficult for that team,
I 
will make the scenario easier to beat.  I will add a disclaimer to my 
scenarios explaining how I tested them for being too difficult.  Does 
that make more sense?
